Description: Test that login page displays all required elements
Test Steps:
1. Navigate to http://localhost:4200/login
2. Verify page elements are visible
Expected Result: Login form displayed with: Email input field, Password input field, Login button, Register link

Test Case Title: Verify successful login with valid credentials
Description: Test login flow with correct credentials
Test Steps:
1. Navigate to login page
2. Enter valid email
3. Enter valid password
4. Click Login button
5. Verify redirect to dashboard
Expected Result: User is redirected to dashboard, Welcome message displayed

Test Case Title: Verify login fails with invalid email
Description: Test error handling for non-existent email
Test Steps:
1. Navigate to login page
2. Enter non-existent email
3. Enter any password
4. Click Login
5. Verify error message
Expected Result: Error message: Invalid credentials, User stays on login page

Test Case Title: Verify login fails with wrong password
Description: Test error handling for incorrect password
Test Steps:
1. Navigate to login page
2. Enter valid email
3. Enter wrong password
4. Click Login
5. Verify error message
Expected Result: Error message: Invalid credentials, User stays on login page

Test Steps:
1. Navigate to login page
2. Enter invalid email format
3. Click outside field or submit
4. Verify validation message
Expected Result: Validation error: Please enter a valid email address

Test Steps:
1. Navigate to login page
2. Leave email empty
3. Leave password empty
4. Click Login
5. Verify validation messages
Expected Result: Validation errors: Email is required, Password is required

Test Steps:
1. Navigate to login page
2. Enter password in password field
3. Verify input is masked
Expected Result: Password is displayed as dots/asterisks, Input is not visible as plain text

Test Steps:
1. Navigate to login page
2. Click on Register link
3. Verify navigation
Expected Result: User is navigated to registration page, URL changes to /register

Description: Test that registration page displays all elements
Test Steps:
1. Navigate to http://localhost:4200/register
2. Verify page elements
Expected Result: Registration form displayed with: First Name, Last Name, Email, Password, Confirm Password, Register button, Login link

Test Steps:
1. Navigate to registration page
2. Fill all fields with valid data
3. Click Register
4. Verify success
Test Data: First Name: John, Last Name: Doe, Email: newuser@agdata.com, Password: SecurePass123!, Confirm: SecurePass123!
Expected Result: Registration successful, User redirected to dashboard or login, Success message displayed

Test Steps:
1. Navigate to registration page
2. Enter weak password
3. Verify validation message
Expected Result: Validation error showing: Min 8 chars, Uppercase, Lowercase, Number, Special character required

Test Steps:
1. Navigate to registration page
2. Enter password
3. Enter different confirm password
4. Verify validation
Expected Result: Validation error: Passwords do not match

Test Steps:
1. Navigate to registration page
2. Enter existing email
3. Fill other fields
4. Click Register
5. Verify error
Expected Result: Error message: Email already exists, User stays on registration page

Test Steps:
1. Login as admin
2. Navigate to dashboard
3. Verify page elements
Expected Result: Dashboard displays: KPI cards (Users/Events/Points/Products), Recent Activity, Charts, Quick Actions

Test Case Title: Verify KPI cards show correct data
Test Steps:
1. Login as admin
2. Navigate to dashboard
3. Verify KPI values match database
Expected Result: KPI cards show accurate: Total Active Users, Total Events, Total Points issued, Total Products

Test Steps:
1. Navigate to dashboard
2. Click each quick action button
3. Verify navigation
Expected Result: Quick actions navigate to: Create Event, Add Product, Add User, View Redemptions

Test Steps:
1. Navigate to dashboard
2. Verify recent activity list
3. Verify activity details
Expected Result: Recent activities displayed with: Activity type icon, Description, Timestamp, Related user/entity

Test Steps:
1. Login as employee
2. Navigate to dashboard
3. Verify page elements
Expected Result: Dashboard displays: Points balance card, Recent transactions, Upcoming events, Featured products

Test Steps:
1. Login as employee
2. Navigate to dashboard
3. Verify points balance
Expected Result: Points balance shows: Current balance, Pending points, Total earned

Test Steps:
1. Login
2. Navigate to Events
3. Verify page loads
Expected Result: Events page displays: Events list/grid, Search/filter options, Event cards with details

Test Steps:
1. Navigate to Events page
2. Verify event card information
Expected Result: Each event card shows: Event name, Date/Time, Status badge, Description preview, Participants count

Test Steps:
1. Navigate to Events
2. Apply status filter (Upcoming)
3. Verify filtered results
Expected Result: Only Upcoming events displayed, Other status events hidden

Test Steps:
1. Navigate to Events
2. Enter search term
3. Verify search results
Expected Result: Events matching search term displayed, Non-matching events hidden

Test Steps:
1. Navigate to Events
2. Click on an event
3. Verify detail page
Expected Result: Event detail shows: Full name/description, Date/time, Location, Participants list, Registration button

Preconditions: Employee logged in and event available
Test Steps:
1. Login as employee
2. Navigate to event detail
3. Click Register button
4. Verify registration
Expected Result: Registration successful message, Button changes to Unregister, Participant count increases

Test Steps:
1. Navigate to registered event
2. Click Unregister button
3. Confirm action
4. Verify unregistration
Expected Result: Unregistration successful, Button changes to Register, Participant count decreases

Test Steps:
1. Login as admin
2. Navigate to Events management
3. Click Create Event
4. Verify form fields
Expected Result: Create event form shows: Name, Description, Date picker, Points pool, Max participants, Prize fields

Test Steps:
1. Fill create event form
2. Submit form
3. Verify event created
Test Data: Name: Test Event, Date: Future date, Points: 500
Expected Result: Event created successfully, Event appears in list, Success message displayed

Preconditions: Admin logged in and event exists
Test Steps:
1. Navigate to event management
2. Select an event
3. Change status (Draft to Upcoming)
4. Verify change
Expected Result: Status changed successfully, Event list reflects new status

Test Steps:
1. Navigate to completed event
2. Click Award Points
3. Select winners
4. Submit awards
5. Verify points awarded
Expected Result: Points awarded successfully, Winners receive points, Transaction created

Test Steps:
1. Login
2. Navigate to Products
3. Verify page elements
Expected Result: Products page displays: Product grid/list, Category filter, Search bar, Product cards

Test Steps:
1. Navigate to Products
2. Verify product card details
Expected Result: Product card shows: Product image, Name, Points cost, Stock status, Category

Test Steps:
1. Navigate to Products
2. Select a category filter
3. Verify filtered results
Expected Result: Only products from selected category shown

Test Steps:
1. Click on a product
2. Verify detail page
Expected Result: Product detail shows: Full description, Large image, Points cost, Stock availability, Redeem button

Test Steps:
1. Navigate to product
2. Click Redeem button
3. Verify redemption dialog
Expected Result: Redemption dialog shows: Product summary, Quantity selector, Points to deduct, Confirm/Cancel buttons

Preconditions: Employee has points and product in stock
Test Steps:
1. Click Redeem on product
2. Select quantity
3. Confirm redemption
4. Verify success
Expected Result: Redemption successful message, Points balance decreased, Redemption appears in My Account

Test Steps:
1. Navigate to expensive product
2. Attempt to redeem
3. Verify error
Expected Result: Error: Insufficient points, Redeem button disabled or error message

Test Steps:
1. Navigate to Products management
2. Click Add Product
3. Verify form fields
Expected Result: Add product form shows: Name, Description, Category dropdown, Points cost, Stock quantity, Image upload

Test Steps:
1. Fill add product form
2. Submit form
3. Verify product created
Expected Result: Product created successfully, Product appears in catalog, Success message

Preconditions: Admin logged in and product exists
Test Steps:
1. Navigate to product management
2. Click Edit on product
3. Update fields
4. Save changes
5. Verify update
Expected Result: Product updated successfully, Changes reflected in catalog

Preconditions: Admin logged in and product exists
Test Steps:
1. Navigate to product management
2. Click Deactivate on product
3. Confirm action
4. Verify deactivation
Expected Result: Product deactivated, Product hidden from employee catalog, Admin can still see

Test Steps:
1. Login as employee
2. Navigate to My Account/Redemptions
3. Verify page elements
Expected Result: My redemptions page shows: List of redemptions, Status column, Date column, Product name, Points spent

Test Steps:
1. Navigate to My Redemptions
2. Verify status badges
Expected Result: Status badges: Pending-Yellow, Approved-Blue, Delivered-Green, Rejected-Red

Test Steps:
1. Navigate to pending redemption
2. Click Cancel
3. Confirm cancellation
4. Verify cancelled
Expected Result: Redemption cancelled, Status changed to Cancelled, Points refunded

Preconditions: Admin logged in and redemptions exist
Test Steps:
1. Login as admin
2. Navigate to Redemptions management
3. Verify page elements
Expected Result: Admin redemptions page shows: All redemptions list, Filter by status, User info column, Action buttons

Test Steps:
1. Navigate to Redemptions
2. Filter by Pending
3. Verify pending list
Expected Result: Pending redemptions displayed, Approve/Reject buttons visible, User and product info shown

Preconditions: Admin logged in and pending redemption exists
Test Steps:
1. Navigate to pending redemption
2. Click Approve
3. Verify approval
Expected Result: Redemption approved, Status changed to Approved, Success message displayed

Preconditions: Admin logged in and pending redemption exists
Test Steps:
1. Navigate to pending redemption
2. Click Reject
3. Enter rejection reason
4. Confirm rejection
Expected Result: Redemption rejected, Status changed to Rejected, Points refunded to user

Preconditions: Admin logged in and approved redemption exists
Test Steps:
1. Navigate to approved redemption
2. Click Mark as Delivered
3. Confirm action
Expected Result: Status changed to Delivered, Delivery timestamp recorded, Success message

Preconditions: Admin logged in and users exist
Test Steps:
1. Login as admin
2. Navigate to Users management
3. Verify page elements
Expected Result: Users page shows: Users table, Search bar, Add User button, User info columns, Action buttons

Test Steps:
1. Navigate to Users management
2. Click Add User
3. Verify form fields
Expected Result: Add user form shows: Email, First Name, Last Name, Password, Role selection

Test Steps:
1. Fill add user form
2. Submit form
3. Verify user created
Test Data: Email: newuser@agdata.com, Name: New User, Role: Employee
Expected Result: User created successfully, User appears in list, Success message

Preconditions: Admin logged in and user exists (no pending redemptions)
Test Steps:

2. Click Deactivate
3. Confirm action
4. Verify deactivation
Expected Result: User deactivated, Status changed to Inactive, User cannot login

Test Steps:
1. Navigate to Users
2. Enter search term
3. Verify search results
Expected Result: Users matching search displayed, Non-matching users hidden

Test Steps:

2. Verify page elements
Expected Result: Profile page shows: User details (name/email), Edit profile, Change password, Points summary

Test Steps:

2. Click Edit
3. Update name
4. Save changes
5. Verify update
Expected Result: Profile updated successfully, New name displayed, Success message

Test Steps:

4. Enter new password

Expected Result: Password changed successfully, Can login with new password

Test Steps:
1. Login as admin
2. Verify navigation menu items
Expected Result: Admin menu shows: Dashboard, Events, Products, Users, Redemptions, Profile, Logout

Test Steps:
1. Login as employee
2. Verify navigation menu items
Expected Result: Employee menu shows: Dashboard, Events, Products, My Account, Profile, Logout

Test Steps:
1. Click each menu item
2. Verify correct page loads
Expected Result: Each menu item navigates to correct page, URL changes appropriately

Test Steps:
1. Click Logout
2. Verify logout
Expected Result: User logged out, Redirected to login page, Session cleared, Protected pages inaccessible

Description: Test accessing protected page without login
Test Steps:
1. Clear session/cookies
2. Navigate directly to /admin/dashboard
3. Verify redirect
Expected Result: Redirected to login page, Original URL preserved for redirect after login

Test Steps:
1. Login as employee
2. Try to navigate to /admin/users
3. Verify access denied
Expected Result: Access denied, Redirected to employee dashboard, Error message or forbidden page

Test Steps:
1. Set viewport to mobile (375px)
2. Navigate to login page
3. Verify layout
Expected Result: Login form displays correctly, No horizontal scrolling, Buttons are tappable size

Test Steps:
1. Set viewport to mobile
2. Navigate to dashboard
3. Verify layout
Expected Result: Dashboard adapts to mobile, KPI cards stack vertically, Navigation collapses to hamburger

Test Steps:
1. Set viewport to mobile
2. Navigate to Products
3. Verify grid layout
Expected Result: Products display in single column, Product cards are full width, Images scale appropriately

Preconditions: Tablet viewport and admin logged in
Test Steps:
1. Set viewport to tablet (768px)
2. Navigate through admin pages
3. Verify layouts
Expected Result: Pages adapt to tablet size, Tables may have horizontal scroll, Navigation visible or hamburger

Test Steps:
1. Trigger an API error
2. Verify error is displayed to user
Expected Result: User-friendly error message displayed, Toast/snackbar notification, Technical details hidden

Test Steps:
1. Navigate to invalid URL
2. Verify 404 page
Expected Result: 404 Not Found page displayed, Link to return to dashboard/home

Test Steps:
1. Wait for token to expire
2. Try to perform action
3. Verify handling
Expected Result: User notified of session expiration, Redirected to login page, Can login again

Test Case Title: Verify loading spinner on data fetch
Test Steps:
1. Navigate to page with data
2. Observe loading state
3. Verify spinner/skeleton
Expected Result: Loading indicator displayed while fetching, Indicator disappears when data loads

Test Steps:
1. Click submit button
2. Observe button state during submission
Expected Result: Button shows loading state, Button disabled during submission, Prevents double submission

Test Steps:
1. Start typing in validated field
2. Enter invalid value
3. Observe validation timing
Expected Result: Validation message appears on blur, Clear indication of error, Field highlighted

Test Steps:
1. Leave required fields empty
2. Click submit
3. Verify all validations shown
Expected Result: All validation errors displayed, Form not submitted, Focus moved to first error

Test Steps:
1. Navigate to login page
2. Tab through all elements
3. Verify focus order
Expected Result: All interactive elements focusable, Logical tab order, Visible focus indicators

Test Steps:
1. Navigate to form page
2. Verify all inputs have labels
3. Test screen reader
Expected Result: All form inputs have associated labels, Labels are descriptive, Required fields indicated

Test Steps:
1. Clear cache
2. Navigate to dashboard
3. Measure load time
Expected Result: Dashboard loads within 3 seconds, No visible layout shifts, Content renders progressively

Test Steps:
1. Navigate to page with many records
2. Verify pagination works
3. Test page navigation
Expected Result: Pagination controls displayed, Page loads quickly, No browser freeze
